## ObjectHasOwn type

Type utility that represents an object type with a guaranteed property. Used by the [hasOwn()](./type-object.hasown.md) function to provide type-safe property existence checks.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ObjectHasOwn<T, K> = T & {
    [P in Extract<K, PropertyKey>]: P extends keyof T ? T[P] : unknown;
};
```

## Example


```ts
interface User { name?: string }
type UserWithName = ObjectHasOwn<User, 'name'>; // User & { name: string | undefined }

type UnknownObj = ObjectHasOwn<unknown, 'id'>; // unknown & { id: unknown }
```
